name: MindGame_1
description:
Do you know this psychological tests?
The ones where your brain does not work like you want to? Then this prototype is exactly what you want to test out! Train your brain and gain some highscoores!
Can you compete with other Scoores? Well, let's find out! Controles:

Since the Topic was "One Button" you just have the "x" Button for interaction.

This prototype was created at the GameDesign//UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai  "Game A Week"  
(Summer Semester 2019)
